backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, audio submission metadata, and access-controlled queries and mutations for users and admins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing required AuthContext routing, login, and UX behaviors tied to specific frontend files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference file containing pre-written summaries for multiple frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML document bootstrapping the app and loading the main TypeScript entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level app component wrapping Creator Zone content in AuthProvider.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin interface for reviewing, approving, and rejecting audio submissions and viewing artists.
frontend/src/components/CreatorZoneAuthC: Login/logout control buttons that reflect authentication and login-in-progress state.
frontend/src/components/CreatorZoneTab.t: Creator-facing form for submitting audio metadata with inline idle-logout alert behavior.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a footer with copyright text and links to caffeine.ai using icons.
frontend/src/components/FullScreenLoadin: Displays a centered full‑screen loading spinner with an optional message.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with navigation, authentication handling, admin checks, and dynamic query resets on identity changes.
frontend/src/contexts/AuthContext.tsx: Provides auth state, idle timeout auto‑logout, login/logout helpers, and admin redirect after login.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth client loading, login, logout, and exposes identity and login state via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React‑Query hooks wrapping backend calls for profiles, roles, admin checks, and audio submissions.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup and CSS variables defining light/dark theme color tokens and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/Studio.tsx: Admin-only Studio page that checks identity and role, redirects unauthorized users, and renders the admin panel with loading states.
frontend/src/router.ts: Creates and registers the TanStack Router instance using the route tree.
frontend/src/routeTree.tsx: Defines the root, index, and /studio routes using TanStack Router with shared layout components.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash and query routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, layout, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current version, architectural rules, admin access constraints, and known UI issues.
